Description:
We are hiring a Logistic CoordinatorLocation - DubaiSalary - AED 2500 -3000/-We are currently seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Logistic Coordinator to join our client in industrial manufacturing industry. As a Logistic Coordinator, you will be responsible for coordinating and overseeing all logistical operations within our company. This includes managing the movement of goods, coordinating with suppliers and customers, and ensuring timely delivery of products.Responsibilities:Create and maintain detailed schedules and plans for all logistical operations.
Coordinate with suppliers and customers to ensure timely delivery of goods.
Monitor inventory levels and track the movement of products.
Manage and organize all necessary documentation related to logistics, including shipping and customs documentation.
Resolve any issues or delays in logistics operations, and escalate to appropriate parties when necessary.
Collaborate with internal teams to ensure seamless coordination and communication.
Ensure compliance with all relevant laws, regulations, and standards related to logistics.
Implement and improve logistics processes to optimize efficiency and reduce costs.
Perform data analysis and generate reports on logistics performance.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in logistics.Skills
